name: CPTabBarTemplate
desc: A container template that displays and manages other templates, presenting them as tabs.

items.name: init(templates: [CPTemplate])
items.desc: Creates a tab bar template that displays the provided root templates as tabs.

items.name: var delegate: CPTabBarTemplateDelegate?
items.desc: The object that acts as the template’s delegate.

items.name: protocol CPTabBarTemplateDelegate
items.desc: The methods an object implements to act as the delegate for a tab bar template.

items.name: func updateTemplates([CPTemplate])
items.desc: Adds, removes, reorders, or updates the tab bar’s templates.

items.name: class var maximumTabCount: Int
items.desc: The maximum number of tabs that the template can display.

items.name: var selectedTemplate: CPTemplate?
items.desc: The currently selected template in the tab bar.
